alert.note: Alert for Custer; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 11:32PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of northern Perkins, southeastern Keith, Lincoln and southwestern Custer Counties through 1215 AM CDT/1115 PM MDT/... At 1130 PM CDT/1030 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking showers producing strong gusty winds from 7 miles northwest of Grant... through Dickens...to near Gothenburg. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, Callaway, Paxton, Brady, Maxwell, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Sarben, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, North Platte Airport, Roscoe, Keith, Cottonwood Canyon State Wildlife Management Area, O`Fallons, Lodi, Finchville, Etna, Milldale and Coker. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 69 and 82. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 131 and 207. Highway 83 between mile markers 63 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
